Style/FloatDivision.description:
Description

For performing float division, coerce one side only.
Style/FloatDivision.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://blog.rubystyle.guide/ruby/2019/06/21/float-division.html'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyle: single_coerce (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['left_coerce', 'right_coerce', 'single_coerce', 'fdiv'] (type: list)
